definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: She was not only extremely intelligent but also very practical.
sentences.chinese: 她不僅絕頂聰明，而且非常務實。

sentences.english: Employ extremly intelligent young people and establish survival-of-the-fittest employment system.
sentences.chinese: 聘用絕頂聰明的年輕人，建立適者生存的用人機制。
